columns.name: topic_arn
columns.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Topic.

columns.name: display_name
columns.description: The human-readable name used in the From field for notifications to email and email-json endpoints.

columns.name: application_failure_feedback_role_arn
columns.description: IAM role for failed deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with platform application endpoint.

columns.name: application_success_feedback_role_arn
columns.description: IAM role for successful deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with platform application endpoint.

columns.name: application_success_feedback_sample_rate
columns.description: Sample rate for successful deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with platform application endpoint.

columns.name: firehose_failure_feedback_role_arn
columns.description: IAM role for failed deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with kinesis data firehose endpoint.

columns.name: firehose_success_feedback_role_arn
columns.description: IAM role for successful deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with kinesis data firehose endpoint.

columns.name: firehose_success_feedback_sample_rate
columns.description: Sample rate for successful deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with firehose endpoint.

columns.name: http_failure_feedback_role_arn
columns.description: IAM role for failed deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with http endpoint.

columns.name: http_success_feedback_role_arn
columns.description: IAM role for successful deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with http endpoint.

columns.name: http_success_feedback_sample_rate
columns.description: Sample rate for successful deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with http endpoint.

columns.name: lambda_failure_feedback_role_arn
columns.description: IAM role for failed deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with lambda endpoint.

columns.name: lambda_success_feedback_role_arn
columns.description: IAM role for successful deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with lambda endpoint.

columns.name: lambda_success_feedback_sample_rate
columns.description: Sample rate for successful deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with lambda endpoint.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: The AWS account ID of the topic's owner.

columns.name: sqs_failure_feedback_role_arn
columns.description: IAM role for failed deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with sqs endpoint.

columns.name: sqs_success_feedback_role_arn
columns.description: IAM role for successful deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with sqs endpoint.

columns.name: sqs_success_feedback_sample_rate
columns.description: Sample rate for successful deliveries of notification messages sent to topics with sqs endpoint.

columns.name: subscriptions_confirmed
columns.description: The number of confirmed subscriptions for the topic.

columns.name: subscriptions_deleted
columns.description: The number of deleted subscriptions for the topic.

columns.name: subscriptions_pending
columns.description: The number of subscriptions pending confirmation for the topic.

columns.name: kms_master_key_id
columns.description: The ID of an AWS-managed customer master key (CMK) for Amazon SNS or a custom CMK.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The list of tags associated with the topic.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: The topic's access control policy (i.e. Resource IAM Policy).

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: delivery_policy
columns.description: The JSON object of the topic's delivery policy.

columns.name: effective_delivery_policy
columns.description: The effective delivery policy, taking system defaults into account.
